INTRODUCTION.P1: Full Stack Developer and Software Engineering student at UEPG, I currently work creating and maintaining Web applications
INTRODUCTION.P2: I have experience with React, Node in serverless architecture, SQL and NoSQL databases and Cloud infrastructures
HURCG.ACTIVITY1: Generation of reports with SQL from Oracle database
HURCG.ACTIVITY2: User support for the Tasy system
HURCG.ACTIVITY3: Creation of automated spreadsheets for data analysis
CONTINENTAL.ACTIVITY1: Creation of intranets for company sectors
CONTINENTAL.ACTIVITY2: Computer management and auditing via PowerShell
MEDCLOUD.ACTIVITY2: Front-end programming in React with GraphQL and internal component library
MEDCLOUD.ACTIVITY1: Back-end development in Node with serverless architecture (AWS Lambda)
UEPG.ACTIVITY1: As an extension student, I developed an Augmented Reality application for the school community and software focused on eye health
UEPG.ACTIVITY2: I produced a 3D game in Unity for the UEPG tourism department
UEPG.ACTIVITY3: I also gave lectures to the community on digital security, topics such as phishing and data protection

PROJECT.COMBUSTIVEL: üöó Meu Carro Flex is an application developed in React Native that helps users determine which fuel is most economical for their vehicles

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.PARAGRAPH1: Your privacy is extremely important to us. We are committed to respecting your privacy and protecting any personal information you may provide through our site, Mateus Pitura, located at https://mateuspitura.github.io/web-react-portfolio/.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION1.TITLE: Information Collection
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION1.PARAGRAPH1: We request your personal information only when it is strictly necessary to provide our services to you. We collect this information in a fair and lawful manner, with your knowledge and explicit consent. We also inform you of the reasons for collecting it and how it will be used.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION2.TITLE: Use and Storage of Information
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION2.PARAGRAPH1: We retain the information collected only for as long as necessary to provide the requested service. We store data protected by technically appropriate security measures to prevent loss, theft, unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use, or alteration.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION3.TITLE: Information Sharing
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION3.PARAGRAPH1: We do not share your personal information publicly or with third parties except when required by law.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION4.TITLE: External Sites
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION4.PARAGRAPH1: Our site may contain links to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we do not control these sites and cannot assume responsibility for their privacy policies.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION5.TITLE: Refusal of Information
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION5.PARAGRAPH1: You may choose not to provide your personal information, with the understanding that this may prevent us from providing certain services to you.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION6.TITLE: Acceptance of This Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION6.PARAGRAPH1: Your continued use of our site indicates acceptance of our privacy policy. If you have any questions about how we manage user data and personal information, please do not hesitate to contact us.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION7.TITLE: Advertising and Cookies
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION7.PARAGRAPH1: We use Google AdSense to serve ads, which uses a DoubleClick cookie to serve relevant ads and limit ad repetition. More information about Google AdSense's privacy practices can be obtained directly from their FAQ.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION7.PARAGRAPH2: Behavioral advertising cookies are used to ensure ads are relevant to you by tracking your interests anonymously.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION8.TITLE: User Commitment
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION8.PARAGRAPH1: By using the Mateus Pitura site, you agree to:
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION8.LIST.ITEM1: Not engage in illegal activities or activities contrary to ethics and public order;
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION8.LIST.ITEM2: Not disseminate discriminatory, illegal content or content that promotes harmful activities against human rights;
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION8.LIST.ITEM3: Not cause damage to the physical and logical systems of Mateus Pitura, its suppliers, or third parties.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION9.TITLE: More Information
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION9.PARAGRAPH1: We hope you are clear about cookies. If you are unsure about something, we recommend keeping cookies enabled to ensure our site's functionalities work as expected.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION9.PARAGRAPH2: This policy is effective from July 26, 2024.
